Name: Fort Lauderdale
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Rum, vermouth, lime and orange combine in this juicy fresh golden cocktail. It's relevance to Fort Lauderdale is yet to be revealed to us.
Nutrition: One serving of Fort Lauderdale contains 151 calories
